column4: Okay.. I asked yesterday and the day before... I don't understand networking at all...! I installed SSH server on my other computer, ... now how do I access it from this computer? (behind same router, not through the internet) o_o
what os are you running on the computer you are using now?
all that should be required is: from the terminal: ssh -l<loginname> <ipaddressofsshserver>
the login name is the username on the other computer. to get the ip go to the other computer and at the terminal type: ifconfig
